thread.title: Hudson Mohawke Shares New Valentine’s Mix, Video With Actual Heart Surgery
thread.title_full: Hudson Mohawke Shares New Valentine’s Mix, Video With Actual Heart Surgery

author: Noah Yoo
title: Hudson Mohawke Shares New Valentine’s Mix, Video With Actual Heart Surgery
text:
Hudson Mohawke Shares New Valentine’s Mix, Video With Actual Heart Surgery The tenth installment in his annual Slow Jams series Hudson Mohawke Photo by Emma McIntyre/Getty Images for Coachella 
Hudson Mohawke has once again shared a new DJ mix for Valentine’s Day. This year’s mix is the tenth edition of his Slow Jams series, and as usual it is available as a free download . The producer also shared a rather graphic promo video for the mix, featuring heart surgery and fake quotes from doctors saying things like, “Let’s be honest, it’s not even that deep... I prefer his early stuff, like TNGHT .” Listen to it below. 
Hudson Mohawke: Valentine’s Slow Jams X (via SoundCloud ) — Hudson Mohawke (@HudMo) February 14, 2017 
Watch TNGHT and Future on Pitchfork.tv's "Selector": Artists In This Story
